fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Competition, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, External Relations, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
As a Trade Association, UKPIA expresses an industry-wide view, based upon sound science, on energy, industry, transport and climate policy issues. UKPIA engages in an active dialogue about key issues in the energy, transport and industry sectors and publishes position papers on significant topics, these can be found on our website. http://www.ukpia.com/publications.aspx 
 
In 2015, particular focus will be on the following: EU ETS and the Market Reserve Stability, Fuel Quality Directive and the Renewable Energy Directive, 2030 Climate and Energy Framework, National Emissions Ceiling Directive, Medium Combustion Plant Directive and the Energy Efficiency Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
UKPIA represents the interests of eight member companies engaged in the UK downstream oil industry on a range of common issues relating to refining, distribution and marketing of oil products, in non-competitive areas. 
 
UKPIA's role is to inform its members of proposed legislation and related developments, and to help form and advocate the industry's position.
